org.gbif.portal.model

Class OccurrenceTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.portal.model.OccurrenceTable

  • public class OccurrenceTable
extends Object
    Class that represents the configuration for the HTML table shown in the occurrence search page.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  OccurrenceTable.OccurrenceColumn
      Enum that represents the visible columns in the occurrence page.
      static class  OccurrenceTable.OccurrenceSummaryField
      Enum that represents the visible information of the summary column in the occurrence page.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OccurrenceTable()
      Default constructor.
      OccurrenceTable(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchRequest<org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.search.OccurrenceSearchParameter> searchRequest)
      Creates an instance container the columns and summary fields set in the request parameter.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EnumSet<OccurrenceTable.OccurrenceColumn> getColumns()
      Holds the list of visible columns, the default value is OccurrenceColumn.values().
      int getSummaryColspan()
      Gets the html.table.td colspan value for the summary column.
      EnumSet<OccurrenceTable.OccurrenceSummaryField> getSummaryColumn()
      Summary column contains basic occurrence information, its default values are OCCURRENCE_KEY, CATALOGUE_NUMBER, SCIENTIFIC_NAME, INSTITUTION.
      boolean hasColumn(OccurrenceTable.OccurrenceColumn column)
      Checks if the column parameter exists in the list of columns.
      boolean hasColumn(String column)
      Checks if the column name parameter exists in the list of columns.
      boolean hasSummaryField(OccurrenceTable.OccurrenceSummaryField field)
      Checks if the field parameter exists in the list of summary fields.
      boolean hasSummaryField(String column)
      Checks if the column name parameter exists in the list of summary fields.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • OccurrenceTable

        public OccurrenceTable()
        Default constructor. Creates a instance containing the default elements.

      • OccurrenceTable

        public OccurrenceTable(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
               org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchRequest<org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.search.OccurrenceSearchParameter> searchRequest)
        Creates an instance container the columns and summary fields set in the request parameter.

    • Method Detail

      • getColumns

        public EnumSet<OccurrenceTable.OccurrenceColumn> getColumns()
        Holds the list of visible columns, the default value is OccurrenceColumn.values(). Values can be set by setting the parameter 'columns'.

      • getSummaryColspan

        public int getSummaryColspan()
        Gets the html.table.td colspan value for the summary column.

      • getSummaryColumn

        public EnumSet<OccurrenceTable.OccurrenceSummaryField> getSummaryColumn()
        Summary column contains basic occurrence information, its default values are OCCURRENCE_KEY, CATALOGUE_NUMBER, SCIENTIFIC_NAME, INSTITUTION.

      • hasColumn

        public boolean hasColumn(OccurrenceTable.OccurrenceColumn column)
        Checks if the column parameter exists in the list of columns.

      • hasColumn

        public boolean hasColumn(String column)
        Checks if the column name parameter exists in the list of columns.

      • hasSummaryField

        public boolean hasSummaryField(OccurrenceTable.OccurrenceSummaryField field)
        Checks if the field parameter exists in the list of summary fields.

      • hasSummaryField

        public boolean hasSummaryField(String column)
        Checks if the column name parameter exists in the list of summary fields.
